post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Senior Java Developer
About the Job
Senior programmers only! There will be a test on Java programming using Eclipse environment before an interview may be arranged.





1. Expert knowledge of Java programming language, Java Standard Edition, Java Swing.


2. Solid understanding of OOP principles and three-tier applications design and related issues.


3. Good experience in writing server side code.


4. Strong knowledge of RDMS (preferably MS SQL Server 2005/2008) and SQL language


5. Database optimization and Performance troubleshooting skills
involving analyzing query execution plans, index creation etc.


6. Excellent verbal and writing communication skills


7. TCP/IP and socket programming understanding and experience in developing custom network protocols


9. Understanding of software development lifecycle


10. Familiarity with Eclipse ID.


11. Experience in managing large code base using one of the version control systems, especially Subversion


Location:Markham, ON L3R 9W8
Industries:Computer Software
Job Type:Full Time
Employee:Years of Experience 5+​ to 7Years
Education Level:Bachelor's Degree
Career Level:Experienced (Non-Manager)
Salary:55,000.​00 - 75,000.​00 CAD /​year
compensation commensurate with experience
Job Reference Code:SJD
post.title: Sr.Java Developer
